APP.HEADING: Sudoku Solver
APP.HOW-TO-CONTENT: This website is a fast Sudoku solver where the result is calculated directly on your device. To get the solution for a Sudoku puzzle, simply enter all known numbers into the following form and press Solve!

SUDOKU-BOX.UNSOLVABLE-CONTENT: There is no valid solution for the Sudoku puzzle that you just entered!
SUDOKU-BOX.FORM-INVALID-SNACK-BAR-MESSAGE: Some of the entries are not valid or exclude each other! The Sudoku puzzle can only be solved when all entries are valid.

RESET-DIALOG.TITLE: Reset
RESET-DIALOG.CONTENT: Are you sure that you want to reset the Sudoku puzzle?
